articles.author: Kieran Nicholson
articles.title: Immigrants can sue federal detention center in Colorado over forced labor, appeals court says
articles.description: A lawsuit representing about 62,000 people who were held in an Aurora immigration detention center can proceed the 10th Circuit Court of Appeals ruled.

articles.author: Danika Worthington
articles.title: Denver Sheriff’s Department to consider bringing back in-person visits with working committee next week
articles.description: The Denver Sheriff's Department is convening a 35-person working committee to explore how to bring in-person inmate visitation back to the city's jails at the request of the independent monitor.

articles.author: Diana DeGette
articles.title: America must do better for those coming to us in need
articles.description: We must do this not just for people who come here with hope in their hearts and the tiny hands of the next generation clasped in their own.

articles.author: Shane Harris, David Weigel, Karoun Demirjian
articles.title: Democrats intensify fight for immigrant children — and bludgeon Trump and Republicans ahead of midterms
articles.description: Democrats expanded their campaign Sunday to spotlight the Trump administration's forced separation of migrant children from their families at the U.S. border, trying to compel a change of policy and gain political advantage five months before midterm election…
